thread.title: Deb

author: Deb
title: Deb
text: Having never been involved in an accident in my 40+ years of driving, I was at a loss as to what to do. I was injured and knew I needed a car accident Lawyer. My nephew referred me to this group and Hal Wheelan. He has been a godsend, I now understand the process and what to do and not to do, since I was rear ended and not at fault. Thanks to Hal and Accident Attorneys Group, I know I will be taken care
